title: Defending with VTOLs
contents: VTOL units may also be used to defend areas of the map.
VTOLs can be assigned to a VTOL Strike Turret or VTOL Radar Tower, and will automatically attack anything targeted by the sensor (much like artillery assigned to a standard sensor).
VTOLs can also be ordered to Patrol or Circle an area. When doing so, they will automatically attack any enemy encountered along their path.
